exm.mng: Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling, see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]
overgrown gate, wicker windows (idiom); poor person's house, humble home
Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling
wicker door, hole window (idiom); fig. wretched hovel, living in poverty
